allow: Bash(echo "Checking all Resource files for proper USER_ID_HEADER implementation..." echo "" echo "Files with LAW_FIRM_ID_HEADER in processCommand:" grep -r "fun processCommand" src/main/kotlin/de/alex --include="*Resource.kt" --include="*Ressource.kt" -A 5)

Bash(head -3 echo "" echo "2. UpdateContactRessource.kt:" grep "MetaData.with.*and.*USER_ID_HEADER" src/main/kotlin/de/alex/cases/updatecontact/internal/UpdateContactRessource.kt echo "" echo "3. ArchiveRueckverkehrResource.kt:" grep -A 1 "@RequestHeader\(USER_ID_HEADER\)" src/main/kotlin/de/alex/erv/archiverueckverkehr/internal/ArchiveRueckverkehrResource.kt)

Bash(head -3 echo "" echo "2. Checking a Case file:" grep ".and\(USER_ID_HEADER, userIdHeader\)" src/main/kotlin/de/alex/cases/createcase/internal/CreateCaseRessource.kt echo "" echo "3. Checking a Law Firm file:" grep -A 1 "@RequestHeader\(USER_ID_HEADER\)" src/main/kotlin/de/alex/lawfirm/createlawfirmspace/internal/CreateLawFirmSpaceRessource.kt)

Bash(head -2 echo "" echo "4. Checking ERV file:" grep ".and\(USER_ID_HEADER" src/main/kotlin/de/alex/erv/archiverueckverkehr/internal/ArchiveRueckverkehrResource.kt echo "" echo "SUCCESS - All updates verified!")
